headline: Big Pharma, Bigger Bargain: Why Merck Stock Is Too Cheap To Ignore (Upgrade)
summary: Financial writer recommends Merck & Co., Inc. as a strong healthcare stock despite recent challenges, citing strong potential. Click for this MRK earnings update.
